explore_title: Find Your Next Favorite Movie Here
explore_body: Get access to a huge library of movies to suit all tastes. You will surely like it.
boarding1_body: Explore a vast collection of movies in all qualities and genres. Find your next favorite film with ease.
boarding2_body: Discover movies from every genre, in all available qualities. Find something new and exciting to watch every day.
boarding3_body: Save movies to your watchlist to keep track of what you want to watch next. Enjoy films in various qualities and genres.
boarding4_body: Share your thoughts on the movies you've watched. Dive deep into film details and help others discover great movies with your reviews.
name: Name
